caption.p: Variation in projected range change (range change index; RCI) to mid‐century for 29 wetland‐dependent bird species based on 1,080 projections per species. Boxplots show the median, and first and third quartiles, with whiskers showing the 1.5 interquartile range. Variation stems from choices of general circulation model ( GCM), climate covariate hypothesis, threshold, and collinearity. See Table S1 for species abbreviations
